alert.note: Alert for Harrison (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 09 at 3:27PM EST by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HARRISON... SOUTHEASTERN MEADE...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...WESTERN BULLITT AND NORTH CENTRAL HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 400 PM EST... At 326 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Brandenburg, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Shepherdsville, Valley Station, Radcliff, Muldraugh, West Point, New Boston, Belmont, Rock Haven, Grahamton and Hughes Landing. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EST for central Kentucky.
